collection:
**Information We Collect, How We Use It, and Legal Basis for Processing**

**Account Information:** We collect your email address to create an account
and verify your identity.

**Device Information:** We collect details about your device type and
operating system for analytics and troubleshooting product issues, fulfilling
our contractual obligations to you.

**Subscription Billing Data:** When you subscribe to Mountainlion, we use
third-party service providers to collect and process your billing information.

Our billing providers may collect information such as your name, billing
address, credit or debit card details, phone number, and email address.

**User Research:** We may ask for your help in testing new features or
participating in surveys to enhance your Mountainlion experience.
Participation is voluntary, and the data collected is anonymous.

**Policy for Children**

Our services are not intended for children under the age of 18, and we do not
knowingly collect personal information from children under 18.

Changes may apply
to any personal information we already hold, as well as any new personal
information collected after the policy modification.

If there are
any significant changes to how we collect, use, or disclose your personal
information, we will provide more advanced and prominent notice affecting your
rights under this policy.
sharing:
**Subscription Billing Data:** When you subscribe to Mountainlion, we use
third-party service providers to collect and process your billing information.

**Interactions with Mountainlion:** Third-party providers and bot developers
may receive detailed information about your interactions with Mountainlion
(including chat content, likes, etc.)

Your Mountainlion account information (e.g., username and email) will not be
shared with any third-party law or developer.

If there are
any significant changes to how we collect, use, or disclose your personal
information, we will provide more advanced and prominent notice affecting your
rights under this policy.

Please remember, any information you provide to bots on Mountainlion will be
shared with third-party LLM providers and developers supporting the bots, and
sensitive personal information (like credit card details, social security
information, etc.)
